EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal for a Special Announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On November 4, 2013, Ben Kepes at Forbes said “Cloud Foundry is on an absolute tear <http://www.forbes.com/sites/benkepes/2013/11/04/breaking-sorry-rackspace-et-al-ubuntu-to-offer-openstack-hosted-cloudfoundry-based-paas/>…”
We want you to join us <http://www.gopivotal.com/theplatform> for the rest of the story on November 12th, which will include a product announcement and remarks from:
- Paul Maritz, CEO - Scott Yara, SVP of Products - James Watters, Head of Product for Cloud Foundry
Register now for the webcast event: The Platform for Building Great Software <http://www.gopivotal.com/theplatform>
We'll send you exclusive early information and a reminder as the event gets closer.
We're excited to have you join us.
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
